EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners - Seth Masters (1314799085.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thanks for the update! I’ll be in touch in about a year!
Steve
From: SETH MASTERS [mailto:sethemasters@gmail.com] Sent: Tuesday, August 30, 2011 8:21 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners - Seth Masters
Steve, After two months of trying connect my contract services with a facility or consulting firm (good propects!), I accepted a W-2 position with a California Medicaid HMO.
Let's stay in touch for the future but i am extremely engaged in the efforts at this HMO and won't see the light of day for a year.
-Seth On Tue, Aug 30, 2011 at 11:09 AM, Steve Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> wrote: Seth,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners and how that would work on your next consulting contract. I wanted to touch base and find out how that was going.
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
This interactive tool shows the value of using a company like MBO as an alternative to incorporation: http://www.mbopartners.com/#whoweareYou can browse through the group benefits you would have access to here: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-exec-group-benefits There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract:http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
As I mentioned once you find your next contract we can do a financial illustration showing what that income would look like being run through MBO Partners.
If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you on my online schedule: https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.
Regards,
Steve ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Enrollments and Market Development MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 m: 540.560.8837 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
